meaningMnemonic:
A <kanji>fur</kanji> <kanji>cloth</kanji> isn't something you'd just throw away. You'd probably turn this warm fur cloth into a nice <vocabulary>blanket</vocabulary>.

毛布 usually refers specifically to a <vocabulary>wool blanket</vocabulary>, as opposed to comforters for example.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
